title: 2Vast XP SP2 Beta 3
description:
This is my third Beta of the 2Vast XP i am working on.
The goal is a very fast and lightweight verision of XP, aimed for every day use.
Remember, this is a BETA and is quite a bit from being finished, so be patient.
This verision takes up just about 1gb of HDD, without the swapfile included.
You an probably run it on any Computer down to 300mhz and 64mb ram, but 450mhz and 256mb ram are my recommendations.

It is very stripped down right now, and will probably not work 100% with all machines. Please report to me about these bugs and difficulties, and I will do my best to fix it until the next release.

I only have a 100kb/s upload line, so PLEASE SEED when you are done downloading. Even 10 to 20kb/s is helping!
On a good day I am able to make and test one release, so I will try and update with new releases for you.
Comment and tell me, and other users, about what needs to be changed, and I will do my best!
Be patient, it will be worth it!


#Unattended install
#Stripped down, occupies 1gb on its own
#Runs fast!
#A couple of extra programs installed
